lines.text: Look at her... just thinking every man's dying for her.
Of course not... he WORKS at a gas station... and he's a poet... and he smells like pine trees...
Well, I called Mother. She's still taking parenting tips from Joan Crawford.
Oh my God, he's got a gun!

[to the man she's making out with]
A woman that brilliant deserves a motel room, son.
Oh you mean besides being an accessory to a robbery and being shot at?!
I forget how cranky you get when you're tired.
